Member Function Documentation

void tinyShaders::shader_t::Compile ( const GLchar *  source)
inline
631  {
632  //if the component hasn't been compiled yet
633  if ( !isCompiled )
634  {
635  GLchar errorLog[512];
636  GLint successful;
637 
638  if ( source != nullptr )
639  {
640  handle = glCreateShader( type );
641  glShaderSource( handle, 1, ( const GLchar** )&source, 0 );
642  glCompileShader( handle );
643 
644  glGetShaderiv( handle, GL_COMPILE_STATUS, &successful );
645  glGetShaderInfoLog( handle, sizeof( errorLog ), 0, errorLog );
646 
647  if ( successful != GL_TRUE )
648  {
649  TinyShaders_PrintErrorMessage( TINYSHADERS_ERROR_FAILED_SHADER_LOAD, GetInstance()->ShaderTypeToString( type ) );
650  printf( "%s\n", errorLog );
651  }
652 
653  else
654  {
655  isCompiled = GL_TRUE;
656  GetInstance()->shaders.push_back( this );
657  iD = GetInstance()->shaders.size() - 1;
658  }
659  }
660  else
661  {
662  TinyShaders_PrintErrorMessage( TINYSHADERS_ERROR_INVALID_SOURCE_FILE );
663  }
664  }
665  else
666  {
667  //either the file name doesn't exist or the component has already been loaded
668  TinyShaders_PrintErrorMessage( TINYSHADERS_ERROR_INVALID_FILE_PATH, filePath );
669  }
670  }
